body.name: Take-Along Train Track Set with 2-in-1 Storage Box, Wooden Train Set for Toddlers 2-4, Railroad Train Toy with Magnetic Train Cars, Theme Park Adventure
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs 32 mins
features: 【Classic Kids Train Set】Features miniature amusement theme park with 15 pcs cartoon blocks such as trees, slide, carousel, shops and joker. Combined with classic magnetic train cars that fit most wooden train track set sold on Amazon. Our wooden train set with continuous carved track is not just a boring old circle, but offers various options to play pretend games. which provides kids endless laughter & adventure.

【First-Class Quality & Safety】Fully tested to the highest US Toy Safty Standard (ASTM /CPSIA). All pieces of our toddler train set are covered with water-based paint, no wire smell. 3D blocks are chunky for babies to grab,no choking hazard. Sturdy 2-in-1 train board is made of premium pine wood. Each corner is finely polished and smooth to the touch.

【Easy to Store & Carry】The 2-in-1 toy table folds up nicely with a secure latch. The case measures 15.55x11.61x2.36 inches when closed and measures 23.43x15.55x2.36 inches when open. All accessories fit inside the case, which is portable with a handle. The lightweight design makes it convenient to take anywhere, anytime. A great travel toy. Perfect wooden train set for toddlers to play indoors and outdoors.

【Learning through Play】This wooden train set for toddlers 1-3 is beneficial to develop their fine motor skills, sense of space, logical thinking and imagination. As well as good for open-ended creative play for both individuals and groups at home and in the classroom.

【Given as A Gift】 Our wooden railroad tracks for kids is a must-have if you have a train-obsessed toddler. Wooden Train Sets for Kids Age 3 4 5. Great train sets for boys 3-5. They would be thrilled to receive this as a birthday or Christmas gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars heavy but amazing quality!
reviews.reviewText: I was quite surprised at how nice this was! I gifted it to my daughter for Christmas and she really loves it. we can take it pretty much anywhere with us, but it is too heavy for any young child to hold themselves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, sturdy toy but pretty basic
reviews.reviewText: I was very pleased with the heavy-duty quality of this. The wood pieces are painted, polished blocks and the hinges of the box aren't cheap and wobbly. The trains and pieces come wrapped together in foam inside the case, and then each and every piece and train is individually wrapped and taped in tissue paper. There was a lot of care in making sure everything stayed looking nice! I really like that there are grooves for the train but I will say they aren't perfectly measured to the trains. The trains fit in the grooves but the grooves don't prevent the trains from going off the tracks when dragging them. It's cool that the trains are magnetic and pull each other. I wish the wood shapes could magnetically sit on the board. They fall over VERY easily, so when little hands are dragging trains around the pieces fall over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kids love it
reviews.reviewText: Train fun only thing i would have done is put magnet system on these so they dont fall down

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As a mom I am always looking for ways to contain the chaos, so I jumped on this little pack up train set. We have a train obsessed little dude who has recently gained appreciation for all things circus, and he was ecstatic to get this for Christmas. He's already gotten hours of play, and when he's done it all packs up neatly into the carry case. It's no problem at all to toss in the car for days on the go and the latches hold securely so it's not spilling out all over the place. The train pieces are well made and overall it's just a great toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This train set is so cute and perfect for kids and on the go traveling. It folds up great and can hold more than what it comes with. It would make the perfect gift for any kiddo who loves trains. It seems like it is made from good material and they would hold up a long time. The details are great and so cute. I love it. Would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and convenient
reviews.reviewText: Overall I really like this toy set for my 3yo son. It's convenient to have all the pieces tucked away within itself and he has had a lot of fun playing pretend with the amusement park theme. It seems to be well made for the most part. My only complaints is that either the track needs to be more shallowe or the wheel need to be bigger. In many parts the wood just drags against eachother rather than the pieces actually rolling. There's also a part of the track on the left side where the pieces have to be forced through, and its wider than the gap in the wheels. If it weren't for these 2 factors that hinder the smoothness of play, I'd give 5 stars, but its still a solid toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars my kids love it
reviews.reviewText: My kids really enjoy playing with this little transit. I really do not have anything negative to say, the babes truly love it, but as a mom I just wish that this came with a little bag to put the pieces inside in a more secure way

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good portable train set except for placement of hinges
reviews.reviewText: This little train set is absolutely adorable! I love the attention to detail and the carnival aspect of it. My son enjoyed setting out the tents and driving the train along the track.The pieces are wooden and smooth, and the train connects via magnets. I love that everything can be stored inside the track. The clasps that hold the storage section closed are not good quality, and I do not expect them to hold up over time.I was also disappointed with the placement of the hinges on the bottom of the train set. The hinges stick out when the track is open, and they will easily scratch your table or floors if you aren't being watchful. I have to make sure my son only plays with this set on a rug.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ein tolles Geschenk für kleine Zug Fans
reviews.reviewText: 🎙️ Vorwort: Ich habe das Holzeisenbahn Set für meine Nichte bestellt, die Züge liebt. Sie hat sich sehr darüber gefreut und spielt gerne damit.📏 Größe: Das Set entspricht genau den angegebenen Maßen in der Beschreibung. Der Koffer ist groß genug, um die einzelnen Teile darin zu verstauen.👀 Aussehen: Es sieht originell, viel schöner aus als auf den Bildern, was meine Erwartungen übertrifft. Der Koffer und die Blöcke sind sehr liebevoll gestaltet.🧵 Verarbeitung/Material: Das Set ist aus hochwertigem Holz gefertigt, das glatt und angenehm in der Hand liegt. Es stellt einen Miniatur-Vergnügungspark dar, der keine Wünsche offen lässt. Es gibt 15 Cartoon Blöcke, die verschiedene Figuren und Szenen darstellen. Die magnetischen Eisenbahnwaggons sind auch sehr niedlich und haben verschiedene Formen und Farben. Sie sind so bunt und passen perfekt zu den Blöcken.⚙️ Technik & Funktion: Die Idee mit dem Holzkoffer und den Eisenbahnwagons finde ich super, denn man muss nur den Koffer aufklappen und die Cartoon Blöcke drauf legen und schon kann das Kind spielen. Das Set ist sehr handlich und vielseitig, es fördert die Feinmotorik und die Vorstellungskraft meiner Nichte. Sie kann kreativ spielen und ihre eigene Welt erschaffen, indem sie zum Beispiel verschiedene Geschichten mit den Figuren erfindet oder die Blöcke neu anordnet.💭 Fazit: Ich bin sehr zufrieden mit dem Set, es ist ein tolles Geschenk für Kleinkinder, die Züge mögen. Es ist qualitativ hochwertig, schön und unterhaltsam. Ich würde es jedem empfehlen, der ein Holzeisenbahn Set sucht.

reviews.reviewTitle: Me encanta como disfrutan mis pequeños con este juego. Ideal para ellos.
reviews.reviewText: 📦 Este producto es de la marca JUSTWOOD.Se trata de un juguete en forma de tren de madera con un tablero que simula una vía y varias figuras, para niños a partir de 3 años y con unas medidas de ‎42 x 31 x 6,6 cm y un peso de 2,23kg.🤔 ¿ LO RECOMENDARÍA ? 🤔Mi respuesta es SÍ y a continuación te detallo los motivos:1. El tablero viene en forma de maletín que al abrirse contiene unas vías de tren.2. Contiene varias figuras para poder jugar con ellas: vagones para el tren, un puesto de comida, una taquilla, una máquina de tren, una carpa, un puesto de palomitas, un túnel, arbustos, tobogán, un niño y un payaso.3. Dentro del maletín se pueden guardar todas las figuras que trae.4. Tiene muy buenas terminaciones y muy buenos acabados y la madera con la que está hecho es bastante robusta.5. El tren contiene imanes para que se unan los distintos vagones.6. Es bastante grande.😔 ¿ LE VEO ALGO NEGATIVO ? 😔Afortunadamente no le he encontrado nada negativo a este producto.👉 MI CONCLUSIÓN:En resumen, me ha parecido un buen juguete para entretener a los más pequeños, ya que pueden conducir el tren por las vías y jugar con las distintas figuras que trae. A la hora de guardarlo, es muy sencillo y práctico, ya que simplemente se meten las figuras en el maletín , se cierra y listo.Así que por todo ello este producto se lleva mis 5 estrellas!!!Esta opinión es completamente personal y basada en mis gustos.Espero que te haya sido de gran utilidad mi comentario sobre este producto!!!

🚂 Ce parc d'attractions pliable en bois avec son petit train à trois wagons est une véritable pépite pour les enfants. La mallette en bois offre un rangement pratique, et une fois déplié, le parc offre une multitude de détails colorés. La robustesse de la conception et la facilité de manipulation en font un excellent choix pour stimuler l'imagination des enfants et développer leur motricité.Points forts:💖 Parc d'attractions pliable sous forme de mallette en bois de très bonne qualité.💖 Inclut de nombreuses décorations colorées.💖 Inclut un petit train magnétiques à trois wagons.💖 Mallette en bois pour un rangement facile.💖 Conception robuste et détails bien faits.💖 Facile à déplier et à ranger comme un échiquier pliable.💖 Stimule l'imagination et développe la motricité des enfants.👍 Je le recommande sans hésitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic take-along play set, really nicely made
reviews.reviewText: I've got this for my nephew and he was really happy with it.This is a take-along play set, really nicely made with a well painted, colourfull and atractive design.Some of the best features of this toy set is that all pieces can easily fit in the wooden case which has clips to hold it close for safe storage or take-away and the fact that the train and the carriages attach together via magnets is absolutelly an fantastic idea for a safe and easy play, perfectly designed for the age.It's a fantastic wooden toy set and I believe that those are some of the best toys you can get for a toddler as they are interactive and most important safe to play.Good price too considering what you get and the quality of it. Very happy with it and the recipient too.

reviews.reviewTitle: "Avventure Ferroviarie in Legno: il Regalo Perfetto per Bambini dai 3 Anni in Su! 🚂🌈🎁"
reviews.reviewText: "Avventure Ferroviarie in Legno: Set per Principianti con Binari Ferroviari, il Regalo Perfetto per Bambini dai 3 Anni in Su! 🚂🌈🎁"Ho recentemente acquistato il Set Ferroviario in Legno per Principianti, un giocattolo perfetto per bambini dai 3 anni in su, e devo dire che è stato un successo immediato! 🚄👦👧Questo set ferroviario in legno è stato un regalo ideale per il compleanno di mio nipote di 3 anni. La facilità con cui i pezzi si collegano ha permesso a lui di creare la sua rete ferroviaria con entusiasmo. I treni in legno sono adorabili e resistenti, perfetti per le mani piccole.Il set include una varietà di binari, curve e incroci che offrono molteplici opzioni per la creazione di percorsi diversi. Questo ha stimolato la creatività di mio nipote mentre progettava e ricostruiva la sua ferrovia.La costruzione robusta dei pezzi in legno garantisce una lunga durata, resistendo agli impatti e all'usura tipici del gioco dei bambini. Il set è anche compatibile con altri set ferroviari in legno, offrendo la possibilità di espandere la collezione nel tempo.In conclusione, se stai cercando un regalo educativo e divertente per bambini dai 3 anni in su, il Set Ferroviario in Legno per Principianti è una scelta eccellente. Un'intrigante avventura ferroviaria che stimola la fantasia e la coordinazione! 🚂🎉🌟
